Installation directory base file URL.description: A URL-based path to the files you want to install. See APInstallerURL for details.

Installation files.description: An array of dictionaries describing the files or directories that can be installed. See APFiles for details.

Application fonts resource path.description: The path to a single font file or directory of font files in the bundle’s Resources directory. See ATSApplicationFontsPath for details.

Resources should be file-mapped.description: RIf true, Core Services routines map the bundle’s resource files into memory instead of reading them. See CSResourcesFileMapped for details.

Main storyboard file base name.description: Specifies the name of the app’s storyboard resource file. See NSMainStoryboardFile for details.

QLSandboxUnsupported.description: Specifies that a Quick Look plug-in does not support sandboxing. See for details.

QuartzGLEnable.description: Specifies whether the app uses Quartz GL. See QuartzGLEnable for details.
